list.li1: a JPG, JPEG, BMP, PNG, TIF or PDF

missing: You must select a file to continue
invalid: The selected file must be a JPG, JPEG, BMP, PNG, TIF or PDF
failed-ocr: The selected file must be clear and readable, containing the whole fit note
tooBig: The selected file must be smaller than 10MB
connection: There was a problem uploading the image, please retry using a Wifi connection

postalInstruction.p1: If you keep having problems uploading your fit note, you should post it to us instead.
postalInstruction.p3: You do not need a stamp.

maxReplay:
You have tried to upload your fit note too many times.
Try again later or you can post it to us.
